<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Crear campaña manual"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/campaigns/manual"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Crea una campaña de mensajería dirigida a grupos específicos

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["title","groups","message"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","example":"Campaña de prueba"},"groups":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"},"example":[1,2],"description":"IDs de los grupos destinatarios"},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Hola, este es un mensaje de prueba."},"schedule_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2025-10-01 10:00:00","description":"Fecha y hora de envío programado (opcional)"},"attach_pdf":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"URL o path del PDF adjunto (opcional)"}},"title":"ManualCampaign"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Campaña creada exitosamente"},"422":{"description":"Error de validación"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
